text:
(1)
Brooklyn and Manhattan Bridges, in their order, as seen from 111 John Street, looking in a north easterly direction.
July 8, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, taken from the twenty-second floor of the Municipal Building.
June 11, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Bridges - Brooklyn Bridge - Manhattan Bridge.
